# titleVariants

**Instance Property**

An array of title strings.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var titleVariants: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each title should be localized and ready for display to the user. The system selects the title to display based on the available screen space.

## Getting Titles

- **subtitleVariants**: An array of subtitle strings.
- **updateTitleVariants(_:subtitleVariants:)**: Updates title and subtitle variants.
title: titleVariants
